conversations.content: Please reschedule my Dental check-up to 2024-05-20 at 10:00.

<function_thought>
To reschedule the dental check-up, I need to first search for the current calendar events that include "Dental check-up". If found, I can extract the identified event to get its ID for rescheduling purposes. After that, I can use the appropriate function to reschedule the event to the new date and time specified by the user (2024-05-20 at 10:00).
</function_thought>

<function_call>[search_calendar_events(query="Dental check-up")]</function_call>

<function_thought>
I found two events related to the phrase "Dental check-up". The relevant one is a confirmed event for a dental visit titled "Dentist Appointment", scheduled on 2024-05-18 at 9:00 AM. 

To proceed with the user's request, I need to reschedule this event to the new date and time of 2024-05-20 at 10:00 AM. I have all the necessary information: 
- Event ID: '5'
- New start time: '2024-05-20 10:00'
- The end time will automatically be computed based on the original duration.
</function_thought>
